data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hormiga, Gustavo (2017): The discovery of the orb-weaving spider genus Pinkfloydia (Araneae, Tetragnathidae) in eastern Australia with description of a new species from New South Wales and comments on the phylogeny of Nanometinae. Zootaxa 4311 (4): 480-490, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4311.4.2|1 occurrence
